text: I test it with Julia@v1.6.0-rc1 on Ubuntu 20.04 and it seems to work now. I guess many people have subscribed to that issue so closing it may notify them the good news. :smile:

elements.text: I test it with Julia@v1.6.0-rc1 on Ubuntu 20.04 and it seems to work now. I guess many people have subscribed to that issue so closing it may notify them the good news.

text: I'd say it's mitigated rather than really solved, should one try to load an external library with symbols marked with `GLIBCXX_3.4.28` they would run exactly into the same issue
